title: tamperevident
extract: A tamper-evident package, according to the regulations of the Food and Drug Administration (21 CFR &sect; 211.132), "is one having one or more indicators or barriers to entry which, if breached or missing, can reasonably be expected to provide visible evidence to consumers that tampering has occurred."May 10, 2005
extract_html: A tamper-evident package, according to the regulations of the Food and Drug Administration (21 CFR § 211.132), "is one having one or more indicators or barriers to entry which, if breached or missing, can reasonably be expected to provide visible evidence to consumers that tampering has occurred."May 10, 2005
